## createBlock() function

Create a block root vnode. Takes the same exact arguments as `createVNode`<!-- -->. A block root keeps track of dynamic nodes within the block in the `dynamicChildren` array.


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createBlock(type: VNodeTypes | ClassComponent, props?: {
    [key: string]: any;
} | null, children?: any, patchFlag?: number, dynamicProps?: string[]): VNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [VNodeTypes](./runtime-core.vnodetypes.md) \| ClassComponent |  |
|  props | { \[key: string\]: any; } \| null |  |
|  children | any |  |
|  patchFlag | number |  |
|  dynamicProps | string\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VNode](./runtime-core.vnode.md)
